org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor

Class SimpleStorageElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor.SimpleStorageElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StorageElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessHistoryStorageElement

    public class SimpleStorageElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements StorageElement
    The simplest implementation of StorageElement, providing all the basic file handling methods and a simple implementation of fileToDelete(). All other StorageElements extend this class and override fileToDelete() with a method dependent on the optimisation algorithm.

    Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4

      • reserveSpace

        public boolean reserveSpace(int filesize)
        Method used at the start of a file transfer to ensure the space reserved for the replicated file is not used. When the file transfer has completed, addPreReservedFile(org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure.DataFile) should be called to register the file with the StorageElement.
        Specified by:
        reserveSpace in interface StorageElement
        Returns:
        true if operation succeeded

      • addFile

        public boolean addFile(DataFile file)
        Add a DataFile to the SE. This method should only be used for files added "instantaneously" to the SE, for example when files are distributed around the Grid at the start of the simulation. For file replication reserveSpace(int) followed by addPreReservedFile(org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure.DataFile) should be used.
        Specified by:
        addFile in interface StorageElement
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if not.

      • listFiles

        public java.lang.String listFiles()
        Query the StorageElement, asking it to list all stored files in a human readable format.
        Specified by:
        listFiles in interface StorageElement
        Returns:
        A textual description of all stored files

      • addPreReservedFile

        public void addPreReservedFile(DataFile file)
        Add a DataFile to the SE. This assumes reserveSpace(int) has been called first and is called at the end of a file transfer to register the file with the SE.
        Specified by:
        addPreReservedFile in interface StorageElement

      • requestFile

        public DataFile requestFile(java.lang.String filename)
        This method returns the DataFile object whose name is specified in the method argument. If the file isn't stored on this SE, then null is returned.
        Specified by:
        requestFile in interface StorageElement
        Returns:
        the DataFile object corresponding to filename, or null if no replica is present.
